Class CombatEngine

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.logic.CombatEngine
public class CombatEngine extends Object
CombatEngine handles the combat mechanics between the hero and enemies. It manages turns, attacks, defenses, and checks for combat termination conditions.
Author:
Yacine

  • Constructor Details

    • CombatEngine

      public CombatEngine()
      Creates a new CombatEngine instance.

  • Method Details

    • startCombat

      public void startCombat(List<Enemy> enemies)
      Starts a combat with the given list of enemies.
      Parameters:
      enemies - the list of enemies to engage in combat

    • endCombat

      public void endCombat()
      Ends the current combat by clearing enemies and intents.

    • getCurrentEnemies

      public List<Enemy> getCurrentEnemies()
      Returns the list of current enemies engaged in combat.
      Returns:
      the list of current enemies, or null if not in combat

    • isInCombat

      public boolean isInCombat()
      Checks if the combat engine is currently in an active combat.
      Returns:
      true if in combat, false otherwise

    • heroTurn

      public void heroTurn(Hero hero, Backpack backpack)
      Executes the hero's turn by resetting energy, block, and updating mana from the backpack.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero whose turn is being executed
      backpack - the backpack containing items that may affect the hero's mana

    • decideEnemyAction

      public EnemyAction decideEnemyAction(Enemy enemy)
      Decides the action of an enemy before its turn.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy whose action is being decided
      Returns:
      the decided EnemyAction

    • decideEnemyIntents

      public void decideEnemyIntents()
      Decides and stores the intents for all alive enemies. This should be called at the start of each round before the hero's turn.

    • getEnemyIntents

      public HashMap<Enemy, EnemyAction> getEnemyIntents()
      Returns the map of enemy intents for the current round.
      Returns:
      the map of enemy intents

    • getEnemyIntent

      public EnemyAction getEnemyIntent(Enemy enemy)
      Gets the intent of a specific enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to get the intent for
      Returns:
      the enemy's intent, or null if not set

    • enemyTurn

      public void enemyTurn(Hero hero, Enemy enemy, EnemyAction action)
      Executes the enemy's turn based on the decided action.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero involved in the combat
      enemy - the enemy whose turn is being executed
      action - the action decided for the enemy

    • heroAttack

      public boolean heroAttack(Hero hero, Enemy enemy, Weapon weapon)
      Handles the hero's attack on an enemy using a specified weapon.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero performing the attack
      enemy - the enemy being attacked
      weapon - the weapon used for the attack
      Returns:
      true if the attack was successful, false otherwise

    • heroDefend

      public boolean heroDefend(Hero hero, Armor armor)
      Handles the hero's defense using a specified armor.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero performing the defense
      armor - the armor used for defense
      Returns:
      true if the defense was successful, false otherwise

    • enemyAttack

      public void enemyAttack(Hero hero, Enemy enemy)
      Handles the enemy's attack on the hero.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero being attacked
      enemy - the enemy performing the attack

    • enemyDefend

      public void enemyDefend(Enemy enemy)
      Handles the enemy's defense action.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy performing the defense

    • isCombatOver

      public boolean isCombatOver(Hero hero)
      Checks if the combat is over based on the hero's and current enemies' status.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero participating in the combat
      Returns:
      true if the combat is over, false otherwise

    • calculateGoldReward

      public int calculateGoldReward()
      Calculates the total gold reward from defeated enemies.
      Returns:
      the total gold reward
